Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Class ChooseProductionOutput

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.ChooseProductionOutput
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChooseProductionOutput
extends Action
ChooseProductionOutput Class contains data and methods to be used when the player concluded payment for a Production to choose the Production output.

Attributes:

  • boolean "firstLeaderCard", "secondLeaderCard", "basicProduction": they are set when activating a production and indicate which different Productions the player chose to activate
  • ArrayList<ResourceType> "firstLeaderCardOutput", "secondLeaderCardOutput", "basicProductionOutput": they contain the outputs chosen by the player
  • Contains the number of fixed resources of the production output. Automatically set when a player starts a production
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • doAction

      public java.lang.String doAction​(ActionController actionController) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Controls and executes the action on the Model.

      After checking all outputs specified by the player, proceeds to add them to the player's strongbox along with all not chosen resources created by the production.

      Overrides:
      doAction in class Action
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      "SUCCESS" if the action went right, another String if it went wrong.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
